Text:
I spent a week downloading this thing... it appears to be 3 .iso files, but no program I use seems to be able to read them.

Admittedly, I only looked at the second two CDs... I purchased a copy of the game quite some time ago and lost the second two CDs, so I was hoping to have the game once again.  But it appears the second two .iso files are corrupt.
I have downloaded the torrent and i have got cd 2 and 3 working but having trouble with cd 1 as it is a mdf file anyone know what to do?
Use MagicISO and try to convert the ISO

good game
works fine on vista sp1
thanks uploader
Excellent, this is just what I was looking for
